metadata.title: CVE-2022-22817 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
PIL.ImageMath.eval in Pillow before 9.0.0 allows evaluation of arbitraryexpressions, such as ones that use the Python exec method. A lambdaexpression could also be used.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-22817` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 9.0.1-1build1
python3-pil.imagetk - 9.0.1-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.0.1-1build1').
